rescuecore2.registry

Class AbstractEntityFactory<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.registry.AbstractEntityFactory<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - An enum type that defines the URNs this factory knows about.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardEntityFactory

    public abstract class AbstractEntityFactory<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityFactory
    An abstract entity factory with helper methods for defining URNs with enums.

      • getKnownEntityURNsEnum

        protected java.util.EnumSet<T> getKnownEntityURNsEnum()
        Get an EnumSet containing known entity URNs. Default implementation returns EnumSet.allOf(T).
        Returns:
